unnormalised: New Delhi: The Ministry of Culture has released the official holiday calendar for FY 2024-2025, announcing dates for major festivals. The notification, released on 20/05/2024, details holidays for central government offices nationwide.
normalised: New Delhi: The Ministry of Culture has released the official holiday calendar for fiscal year two thousand and twenty four-two thousand and twenty five, announcing dates for major festivals. The notification, released on twentieth May two thousand and twenty four, details holidays for central government offices nationwide.

unnormalised: Diwali, a significant Hindu festival, will be observed on 31/10/2024. Celebrations will commence with Dhanteras on 29/10/2024. Gov. offices will be closed for these days.
normalised: Diwali, a significant Hindu festival, will be observed on thirty first October two thousand and twenty four. Celebrations will commence with Dhanteras on twenty ninth October two thousand and twenty four. Government offices will be closed for these days.

unnormalised: Eid-ul-Fitr, marking the end of Ramadan, is scheduled for 02/05/2025, subject to sighting of the moon. Prior to this, Holi will fall on 17/03/2025. Offices shall resume normal functions at 10:00 AM on 03/05/2025.
normalised: Eid-ul-Fitr, marking the end of Ramadan, is scheduled for second May two thousand and twenty five, subject to sighting of the moon. Prior to this, Holi will fall on seventeenth March two thousand and twenty five. Offices shall resume normal functions at ten a m on third May two thousand and twenty five.

unnormalised: Christmas will be celebrated on 25/12/2024, followed by New Year's Day on 01/01/2025. Offices will be closed on both days. Republic Day falls on 26/01/2025.
normalised: Christmas will be celebrated on twenty fifth December two thousand and twenty four, followed by New Year's Day on first January two thousand and twenty five. Offices will be closed on both days. Republic Day falls on twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty five.

unnormalised: The calendar also includes regional festivals such as Onam in Kerala, scheduled for 20/08/2024, and Durga Puja in West Bengal, commencing on 01/10/2024. Individual states may declare additional holidays.
normalised: The calendar also includes regional festivals such as Onam in Kerala, scheduled for twentieth August two thousand and twenty four, and Durga Puja in West Bengal, commencing on first October two thousand and twenty four. Individual states may declare additional holidays.
